body:
The "Large Card Images" setting should have the following values...
- None
- Always
- Full screen only

I am always switching back and forth between full screen (1280 x 1024) and small screen (1024 x 600 ) views and the "Full screen only" option would be very useful since I like to see the images at full scale when there is space available. Probably not a major requirement for general use.
